MarekMailSystem2.EmailStatus

MarekMailSystem2.EmailStatus Class Reference

This class contains two enums: SendingStatus and SmtpStatus. SmtpStatus value is important only when SendingStatus = SmtpFailed or SmtpFailedRecipients. More...

string errorMessage

Detailed Description

This class contains two enums: SendingStatus and SmtpStatus. SmtpStatus value is important only when SendingStatus = SmtpFailed or SmtpFailedRecipients.
